articles.title: About the project and me!
articles.description: This website is for a class about data visualization
articles.contents:
About me!
Iâ€™m Miriam Heiss, and this
is a website that I made for a class. I play the organ,
make soap, and occasionally sew!
About this project!
The data for this project came from Opportunity Insights.
It is about the Economic Connectedness of counties around the United
States.
What should the project show?
The graphs that are included should show counties in the United
States, and how connected to the economy they are, with factors such as
population, and economy.

articles.title: Economic Connectedness
articles.description: Counties around the United States: How economically connected are they?
